title: Vaibhava Kundan Haar: Emerald & Diamond Grandeur
materials: 22K Gold Plated Base. Featuring high-quality Kundan settings
and lustrous South Sea Pearls. Exquisite Hyderabadi Polish for a rich
features: This regal necklace showcases a classic Kundan design with a modern twist. Intricate floral and paisley motifs are meticulously crafted using the age-old Kundan setting technique. Emerald green stones are strategically placed to add a pop of color and enhance the overall design. Dangling South Sea pearls provide graceful movement and a touch of elegance. The detailed setting highlights the brilliance of each CZ diamond, creating a captivating sparkle.
colors: Primarily gold with a brilliant white sparkle from the CZ diamonds. The vibrant emerald green stones offer a striking contrast
while the pearls provide a soft
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (Vivaahaalu)
and important festivals like Diwali and Sankranthi. This Haaram will also make a striking statement at high-profile events.
description: A timeless masterpiece that blends traditional Kundan artistry with contemporary elegance. The exceptional craftsmanship and high-quality materials ensure lasting beauty and durability. A true heirloom piece that can be treasured for generations. The grand design and striking color combination will make you the center of attention at any event.
